TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebProxy

summary.span: 提供 類別 Proxy 存取實作 (Implementation) 的基底介面。

span.span: Provides the base interface for implementation of proxy access for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面提供的方法和屬性所需的類別來存取 proxy 伺服器。The interface provides the methods and properties that are required by the class to access proxy servers. 類別是基底實作介面。The class is the base implementation of the interface.

span.para: 方法可用來控制對 proxy 使用目的 URI 為基礎。使用方法，以表示 proxy 不會用來連線到目的地伺服器。
The method can be used to control proxy use based on the destination URI. Use the method to indicate that the proxy should not be used to reach the destination server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::ICredentials ^ Credentials { System::Net::ICredentials ^ get(); void set(System::Net::ICredentials ^ value); };
member this.Credentials : System.Net.ICredentials with get, set

summary.span: 認證，要送出至 Proxy 伺服器進行驗證。

span.span: The credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.

value.span: 執行個體 (Instance)，包含要驗證 Proxy 伺服器要求所需的認證。

span.span: An instance that contains the credentials that are needed to authenticate a request to the proxy server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是執行個體，其中包含要傳送至 proxy 伺服器，以回應透過 HTTP 407 （proxy 授權） 狀態碼的授權認證。The property is an instance that contains the authorization credentials to send to the proxy server in response to an HTTP 407 (proxy authorization) status code. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來設定的認證，將立即送出到 proxy 伺服器進行驗證。The following example uses the property to set the credentials that will be submitted to the proxy server for authentication. [!code-cpp[IWebProxy_Interface#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CPP/iwebproxy_interface.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IWebProxy_Interface#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CS/iwebproxy_interface.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IWebProxy_Interface#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/VB/iwebproxy_interface.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Uri GetProxy(class System.Uri destination) cil managed
Public Function GetProxy (destination As Uri) As Uri

param.name: destination
param.span: ，指定所要求的網際網路資源。

span.span: A that specifies the requested Internet resource.
Returns the URI of a proxy.

returns.span: 執行個體，包含用來聯繫 之 Proxy 的 URI。

span.span: A instance that contains the URI of the proxy used to contact .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回處理要求至網際網路資源中指定的 proxy 伺服器的 URI`destination`參數。The method returns the URI of the proxy server that handles requests to the Internet resource that is specified in the `destination` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法以傳回 URI，用來存取網際網路資源。The following example uses the method to return the URI that the uses to access the Internet resource. [!code-cpp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CPP/iwebproxy_interface.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CS/iwebproxy_interface.cs#4)] [!code-vb[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/VB/iwebproxy_interface.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsBypassed(class System.Uri host) cil managed
Public Function IsBypassed (host As Uri) As Boolean

param.name: host
param.span: 要檢查 Proxy 使用的主機 。

span.span: The of the host to check for proxy use.

summary.span: 指示不應該為指定的主機使用 Proxy。

span.span: Indicates that the proxy should not be used for the specified host.

returns.span: 如果不應該為 使用 Proxy 伺服器，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the proxy server should not be used for ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，指出是否要使用 proxy 伺服器來存取主應用程式中指定`host`參數。The method indicates whether to use the proxy server to access the host that is specified in the `host` parameter. 如果是`true`、 proxy 不會用來連線至主機，以及要求直接傳遞至伺服器。If is `true`, the proxy is not used to contact the host and the request is passed directly to the server. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來判斷是否應該使用指定的主機的 proxy 伺服器。The following example uses the property to determine whether the proxy server should be used for the specified host. [!code-cpp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CPP/iwebproxy_interface.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CS/iwebproxy_interface.cs#4)] [!code-vb[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/VB/iwebproxy_interface.vb#4)]
